## üîÑ Session Handoff Checklist

### Before You Leave
- [ ] All changes committed and pushed
- [ ] Documentation updated (this template filled out)
- [ ] SESSION_CONTINUITY_LOG.md updated
- [ ] No broken build left behind
- [ ] No sensitive data in commit history
- [ ] Next steps clearly documented

### For Next Developer
- [ ] Read this entire handoff document
- [ ] Review SESSION_CONTINUITY_LOG.md
- [ ] Check git status and recent commits
- [ ] Verify development environment works
- [ ] Run test suite to confirm everything works
- [ ] Execute next critical action item
